title: Software Engineering Student-DevOps
content:
At NICE, we don’t limit our challenges. We challenge our limits. Constantly. We’re relentless. We’re ambitious. And we make an impact. Our NICErs bring their A game and spend each day turning it into an A+. And if you’re like us, we can offer you the kind of challenge that will light a fire within you. 
About Us:NICE enable organizations to address today’s consumer and employee expectations, by delivering effortless, consistent, and personalized digital-first experiences with CXone, the world’s leading cloud CX platform.
Illuminate team is dedicated to developing groundbreaking AI products that are transforming the industry. We promote a culture of collaboration, learning, and the utilization of advanced technologies.
Role Overview:
We are inviting enthusiastic students or recent graduates to join our Illuminate team as Associate DevOps Engineers. This position offers a unique opportunity to learn and contribute to the CI/CD processes and cloud management on AWS and Azure.
Responsibilities:

Assist in the development and maintenance of CI/CD pipelines.
Work closely with experienced DevOps engineers and other teams to learn best practices in development and operations integration.
Support the management of cloud infrastructure on AWS and Azure under supervision.
Help monitor system performance and participate in troubleshooting and optimization tasks.
Engage in continuous learning, adopting industry best practices and new technologies.

Education:

Student of Computer Science, Computer Engineering or Software Engineering.
At least 4 semesters left until graduation

Qualifications:

Knowledge of AWS services
Good knowledge of Python 
Available for 100 hours / 2.5 days a week
Great team player with excellent interpersonal skills
Independent, self-driven, strong self-learner, with ability to self-manage tasks and meet deadlines
Global mindset & great communication skills in English

#LI-HybridAbout NICE 
NICE Ltd. (NASDAQ: NICE) software products are used by 25,000+ global businesses, including 85 of the Fortune 100 corporations, to deliver extraordinary customer experiences, fight financial crime and ensure public safety. Every day, NICE software manages more than 120 million customer interactions and monitors 3+ billion financial transactions. 
Known as an innovation powerhouse that excels in AI, cloud and digital, NICE is consistently recognized as the market leader in its domains, with over 8,500 employees across 30+ countries. 
NICE is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, neurotype, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation or any other category protected by law.
